qas.question: When was the sequel announcement for the third arc?
What was the original run of the third arc of Digimon?
Who was the main character in the third arc series?

answers.text: Tagiru Akashi and his partner Gumdramon

qas.question: What is the dimension called between the human world and digital world?

plausible_answers.text: a sequel set one year later

qas.question: When was the third season aired?
What lies between the digital world?

plausible_answers.text: a tear in Space and Time

qas.question: What causes all the Digimon universe to scatter?

context: On <a0_0>August 17, 2011<a0_0/>, Shueisha's V-Jump magazine announced <b4_0>a sequel set one year later<b4_0/>, a third arc of Xros Wars subtitled The Young Hunters Who Leapt Through Time, which aired from <a1_0><b5_0>October 2, 2011 to March 25, 2012<b5_0/><a1_0/>, following on from the previous arc. It focuses on a new protagonist, <a2_0>Tagiru Akashi and his partner Gumdramon<a2_0/> who embark on a new journey with an older Mikey, Shoutmon, an older Ewan and the revived Damemon, along with other new comrades as they deal with a hidden dimension that lies between the Human World and the Digital World called <a3_0><b6_0>DigiQuartz<b6_0/><a3_0/>. The series finale reintroduces the heroes of the previous five seasons as they all come together and help the current heroes in the final battle due to the fact that the DigiQuartz is essentially <b7_0>a tear in Space and Time<b7_0/>, allowing all of the Digimon universes to converge.
